forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early then periods of showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming steadier and heavier later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with a steady rain developing in the afternoon. The rain will be heavy at times. High 63F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, heavier early. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of heavy rain, becoming lighter late. Low 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 18C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
